attributes.action: Radio1 Cut funding due to poor service
attributes.additional_details: Radio 1 is funded via the TV licencing fees most of us pay. A recent decision was made to scrap the Chris Moyles Breakfast show. The only worthwhile programme on Radio 1. Many people agree it is a disgrace and due to Radio 1 now becoming worthless, we no longer want to pay for the service!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC/BBC Trust.
